activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12518
activity.text:
@Jacobjeevan 
I would like to work on this
ETA: Today

Solution:
The fields don't validate automatically after clicking the "Fill My Details" button. Adding `shouldValidate: true` when setting the values will resolve this issue.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#12319
activity.text:
@rithviknishad The error happens in the deviceform.tsx. The problem is while changing the email select box to phone Input the value in the email is passed to the phone Input, but the phone Input expects a number which causes this error. My solution is to sanitize the value when rendering the PhoneInput
I have also fixed it locally. Happy to raise a PR if you approve
